definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to present to a superior/memorial/petition/to present (a certain appearance)/to assume (a shape)/to be (a certain color)

sentences.english: The stone head of the Buddha is polished because many people rub it as they go past.
sentences.chinese: 路過遊客不斷的撫摸使這個石佛的頭部顯得亮鋥鋥的。

sentences.english: The stone head of the Buddha is polished because many people rub it as they go past.
sentences.chinese: 路過遊客不斷的撫摸使這個石佛的頭部顯得亮鋥鋥的。

sentences.english: It's cheaper to buy software bundled with a PC than separately.
sentences.chinese: 購買和個人鋥電腦一起捆綁銷售的軟件要比單買便宜。

sentences.english: Gill's report surveyed 900 men on their reasons for going to the pub.
sentences.chinese: 基爾的報告中統計了鋥900名男子去酒吧的理由。

sentences.english: That desk shinned near as much as that old bald head of hisen.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子被擦得亮鋥鋥的，就像他那老禿頭一樣光亮。

sentences.chinese: 那桌子被擦得亮鋥鋥的，就像他那老禿頭一樣光亮。

definition: a long narrow vessel with two masts
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
